verbs.description: [ARG0: harley] [V: recalls] [ARG1: 238k motorcycles from 2017 2018 model years milwaukee - based harley - davidson inc issued a recall of roughly 238 300 motorcycles from its 2017 and 2018 model years because of an issue with hydraulic clutch assemblies the recall applies to model year 2017 and 2018 touring trike and cvo touring models and certain 2017 softail models an internal leak in a portion of the clutch can over time lead to the clutch disengaging on its own harley said it notified dealers of the voluntary recall milwaukee - based harley - davidson inc hearst television harley 238k cvo touring]

harley recalls 238k motorcycles from 2017 2018 model years [ARG2: milwaukee] - [V: based] [ARG1: harley - davidson] inc issued a recall of roughly 238 300 motorcycles from its 2017 and 2018 model years because of an issue with hydraulic clutch assemblies the recall applies to model year 2017 and 2018 touring trike and cvo touring models and certain 2017 softail models an internal leak in a portion of the clutch can over time lead to the clutch disengaging on its own harley said it notified dealers of the voluntary recall milwaukee - based harley - davidson inc hearst television harley 238k cvo touring
